blog.title: Jacob A.K.A. KingdomOfKitten
blog.description:
I write sometimes. I think that says a lot about my career choices.

My Twitter: https://twitter.com/KingdomOfKitten

My Letterboxd: https://letterboxd.com/kingdomofkitten/

summary:
Meeting the Families: Part 3
*later that night...*
Retsuko: I just can’t believe it. My own dad wants nothing to do with me,...
body:
Meeting the Families: Part 3

*later that night…*

Retsuko: I just can’t believe it. My own dad wants nothing to do with me, because, what, a beautiful little accident?

Haida: I mean, to be fair, I was surprised my folks took it as well as they did. They could be relatively old-fashioned too.

Retsuko: Well, either way! *sigh* …I knew he might be a little on the fence, but…I didn’t think it’d be like this. Haida, I-I’m so sorry, sweetheart. 😞

Haida: Ah, don’t worry about it! I’ll see if I can talk to him a little bit tomorrow. See if he’ll warm up a bit. Usually you have to let things sit a bit before someone comes around.

Retsuko: ….hmm…..well, alright. Hopefully you do alright.

Haida: Only one way to find out. *they kiss* Let’s get some rest.

Retsuko: Let’s. *they tuck Ikari to sleep, and go to bed*

*meanwhile…*

Riko: *smacks her brother upside the head* Ryuu, you idiot! Why are you being such a jerk?!

Ryuu: OW! Ugh, doesn’t it bother you one bit that she’s just…not what she was supposed to be?!

Riko: …what do you mean?

Ryuu: I mean, she used to be one of the highest regarded, and upstanding! Amongst this entire family! We used to look up to her, like a teacher! Even after the incident! Hell, MORESO after that! Now….she’s just so….agh, I don’t even know what! Laid-back, not honoring our code, on the verge of running amok, and that’s not even getting into her damn boyfriend, and her brat!

Riko: Her FIANCEE, and her SON. Also known as, your NEPHEW. Can’t you just be a LITTLE more supportive for her?! It’s been years since all that went down anyways!

Ryuu: Bah, the memory still remains! If you ask me, dad got the right idea walking out on that nonsense!

Riko: Like how he ALWAYS has the right idea to you?

Ryuu: Shut up! You KNOW this cannot even remotely end well, so don’t bother trying to be all optimistic about it! *slams the door to his room*

Riko: *sigh* Darn it all, Ryuu.

*the next day…*

Haida: *outside, on a peaceful morning…* …..*sighs in relief* this is nice….*sees Ryota tending to a garden* oh! Uh, Mr…..crap, I don’t actually know your family name. Uh, Retsuko’s dad! *runs to him*

Ryota: …….what do you want?

Haida: I, um, I just wanted to talk with you, about what happened last ni-

Ryota: Like I said, I want nothing to do with it. You want to ask someone about the wedding, or whatever? Ask her mother.

Haida: ….well, I apologize if I came across as strong. I’m not saying I’m a saint, but I don’t exactly know what I’ve done to warrant such a cold reaction, from you, or Ryuu.

Ryota: *stands up, and stares at Haida* Well, with Ryuu, he’s generally always siding with me, for some reason, don’t ask me why. As for me, let me tell you something. The next time you two plan on having a child, you better check for two things. One, a ring on her finger, and two, NO ALCOHOL IN HER BLOODSTREAM. *storms off*

Haida: *gobsmacked, following him* Wha-it was an accident! We were both drunk!

Ryota: Oh, that absolutely makes it any better!

Haida: Look, neither of us planned to have a kid! Hell, we were both terrified when we heard the news!

Ryota: Then you should’ve gotten rid of it! There are these things, abortion clinics, they do WONDERS.

Haida: She said she didn’t want to abort it!

Ryota: Oh, well, she’s clearly denser than I first thought!

Haida: I-WOW, okay. Just casually insult your daughter like that, alright. That’s cool.

Ryota: Bah, if you were in my shoes, you would be acting this way!

Haida: I doubt it! I…..hey, where are you going, anyway?

Ryota: To pay my respects. *goes over to a small temple, where an urn stands*

Haida: Hu-….*reads the engraving on the urn* “Ryoko”?

Ryota: Retsuko’s grandmother, from my side. *to the grave* Hello, mother. You won’t believe it. Your favorite granddaughter is getting married. I know you would’ve been overjoyed to see that day….*sigh* if only I can share in that.

Haida: ….what was she like?

Ryota: Hmm? Oh, um…very….much like Retsuko, I guess. Very calm whenever she needs to be…..she still had that damn scream, though.

Haida: …wait, “scream”? Like…death metal?

Ryota: Oh, I’m guessing you know about that?

Haida: Yeah. I…didn’t know she got it from someone.

Ryota: Yes, it was inherited…regrettably.

Haida: ….I dunno, I kind of like it.

Ryota: You do? Hmm. I guess that explains a little bit.

Haida: What do you mean?

Ryota: You’re looser. You let her run loose, do whatever she wants. That’s why she’s attracted to you. *walks away* If you know that kind of power she has, you know it can NEVER lead to anything good.

Haida: Wha…you really are being an asshole, you know that?

Ryota: Hmph. I guess that’s how I’ll always be. Though, it’s funny. Being called that by someone who has no idea about Retsuko’s own history. *leaves, leaving Haida alone, by the urn*

Haida: …..what….history?

This went through re-writing, as ideas started popping into my head, one by one. Originally, this story was just meant to be just cute, with a hint of seriousness. While that IS still going to be the intended direction, the hint will certainly be much stronger as we go on. Let’s just say, the “born out of wedlock” Ikari isn’t exactly the only thing Retsuko has done to potentially disgrace her family. And with that, my announcement will be coming quite soon, dear friends! …..I just, uh….need to double check on some things online. Until then, stay tuned!

summary: Yet another voice actor from "Aggretsuko" joins Tempo for this weeks Tempo Talk. Listen in to Fenneko's talent Katelyn Gault...
caption:
Yet another voice actor from “Aggretsuko” joins Tempo for this weeks Tempo Talk. Listen in to Fenneko’s talent Katelyn Gault talk about Fennecs, sexism and anime voice acting.
Since the recording of this interview, Season 2 of Aggretsuko has been announced as in production for Netflix.

You can check out Katelyn Gault on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/Katelyn_Gault
THeir official website www.katelyngault.com
www.imdb.me/katelyngault

Check out Tempe O'Kun’s books “Sixes Wild” and “Windfall” here: http://furplanet.com/shop/?affillink=YOUTU2907
Check out his FA: https://www.furaffinity.net/user/tempo321/
Here’s a playlist of his other Culturally F’d credits"Tempo Writes" https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLIPk-itLl1jPS7tnT4hdJwBI-CeLF8Kb_
Tempo Talks: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLIPk-itLl1jPyIK2c7mK-LpbvfDNqfcSW

Buy Culturally F’d Merch today: http://www.culturallyfd.com

Support Culturally F’d with small monthly donations: https://www.patreon.com/culturallyfd

Subscribe to our Newsletter: http://tinyurl.com/gsz8us7

trail.content_raw:
Yet another voice actor from “Aggretsuko” joins Tempo for this weeks Tempo Talk. Listen in to Fenneko’s talent Katelyn Gault talk about Fennecs, sexism and anime voice acting.
Since the recording of this interview, Season 2 of Aggretsuko has been announced as in production for Netflix.

You can check out Katelyn Gault on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/Katelyn_Gault
THeir official website www.katelyngault.com
www.imdb.me/katelyngault

summary: Doing some more writing. It’s slow, but it’s coming back already, thank god. Once this part comes out, or maybe I’ll wait until...
body:
Doing some more writing. It’s slow, but it’s coming back already, thank god. Once this part comes out, or maybe I’ll wait until the whole arc is completed, I have a bit of an announcement to make. Until then, I wanna say something that, I kinda knew already, but I didn’t REALLY know until I started getting invested in Aggretsuko. Namely…

Red pandas are so fucking adorable I wanna give them all the hugs and kisses AAAAAAAAA

summary:
So here’s a colored picture of @kingdomofkitten’s Aggretsuko families.
A little bit of triva:
-I decided to give one of their...
body:
So here’s a colored picture of @kingdomofkitten’s Aggretsuko families.

A little bit of triva:

-I decided to give one of their parents similar but different colors so that it’s not that thing that I refer to as “Milhouse’s Parents Syndrome” where BOTH parents are 100% identical to child as well as each other, because that’s just weird.

-I’d also imagine that Riko and Ryuu would be around high school age hence why they wear the traditional Japanese school uniforms.

-Hiroko’s shirt reads “Muscle Gym” In Katakana.

Hope you enjoyed!

If you’re interested in a commission from me the stuff you need to know right down below.

https://firecraker-art-lounge.tumblr.com/post/177844452867/commission-information-before-you-can-even-think
